title: RCH Test Framework - Test Case Schema

meta.description: Meta Filter for Test Case Selection

name.description: Test Case Name. Validated with folder name pattern.

type.description: Test Case Type, the test driver depends on the type

source.description: where the test case originally stored.

testCaseId.description: Test Case ID, reference to external manual test case that storage in test case management system like QC, JIRA...

testCaseIdMap.description: (mobile_app only) Test Case ID Map with key for platform of device, reference to external manual test case that storage in test case management system like QC, JIRA...

requirement.description: Requirement reference similar to test case id

screenshotLevel.description: screen shot will be taken on given level

testDataRef.description: Test Data Reference, File, sql statement or also DB interface.

additionalTestDataFile.description: Test Data Reference, json file only.

appName.description: Name Display of iOS app for mobile testing.

appPackage.description: (Android only) Start point of Android app for mobile testing.

bundleId.description: Bundle ID for iOS mobile testing.

activity.description: (Android only) Start point of android app for mobile testing.

seriesNumber.description: Test Series number for execution sequence of test case with meta

story.description: Story description of the test case.
examples: User tries to login the system with invalid username and invalid password.

epic.description: Epic description of the test case.

feature.description: Feature description of the test case.

startURL.description: Start url for the test object.

name.description: Test step name that implemented in java method with annotation like @TestStep(name="my Step").

testObject.description: Test page object name that implemented in java class with annotation like @TestObject(name="my Step").

using.description: To override the method definition of parameters in annotation like @TestStep(using="myData.user").

comment.description: Comment for additional step info as such special identifier usefully for report

takeScreenshot.description: To specify the screen shot taken strategy only for the step.

stopOnError.description: To specify the stop on error strategy only for the step.
